title: Merak the low cost news agency
creator: Domobility

extendedInfo.description: App Merak helps you to sell news, photos and videos in theMerak web site. A story in Merak costs an average of 15 times less than conventional agency. Which makes information accessible to large and small, so our range of customers is much larger, ranging from major international broadcasters to modest local television and digital publications.Merak is present in every country in the world, you can buy or sell a story anywhere on the globe the same price as you would in your country, you can buy images of the Arab riots at a price too low and you sell the floods half a world city for a fortune
